 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּד‎</span> **verb** ==hunt== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצוּדָה‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒâdu***</u></abbr>, ***hunt***, so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צוּד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיד‎</span>, (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צידא‎</span> ***hunting***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָד֣וּ‎</span> [[Lam.4.18|Lam 4:18]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָדוּנִי‎</span> [[Lam.3.52|Lam 3:52]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצָדוּם‎</span> consecutive [[Jer.16.16|Jer 16:16]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצוּד‎</span> [[Lev.17.13|Lev 17:13]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּ֫דָה‎</span> [[Gen.27.3|Gen 27:3]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺד‎</span> [[Lam.3.52|Lam 3:52]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָצוּד‎</span> [[Gen.27.5|Gen 27:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצָּד‎</span> v[[Gen.27.33|Gen 27:33]] — ***hunt***, with accusative 1. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַיִד‎</span> [[Gen.27.3|Gen 27:3]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צידה‎</span>), v[[Gen.27.5|Gen 27:5]] v[[Gen.27.33|Gen 27:33]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֵיד חַיָּה‎</span> [[Lev.17.13|Lev 17:13]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טֶרֶף‎</span> [[Job.38.39|Job 38:39]] with accusative of person [[Mic.7.2|Mic 7:2]] (+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵרֶם‎</span>, instrumental), [[Jer.16.16|Jer 16:16]] (+<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>), [[Job.10.16|Job 10:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺד צָדוּנִי כַצִּפּוֺד‎</span> [[Lam.3.52|Lam 3:52]], subject evil [[Ps.140.12|Ps 140:12]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְעָדֵינוּ‎</span> [[Lam.4.18|Lam 4:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ יְקָרָה‎</span> [[Prov.6.26|Prov 6:26]]. — [[Hos.9.13|Hos 9:13]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָצוּד‎</span> (or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָצַיִד‎</span>), for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצוֺר‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹר‎</span>. **Po'l.** ***hunt*** (keenly, eagerly?), ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּצוֺדֵדְנָה‎</span> [[Ezek.13.18|Ezek 13:18]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצוֺדֵד‎</span> v[[Ezek.13.18|Ezek 13:18]] Participle feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצֹדְדוֺת‎</span> v[[Ezek.13.20|Ezek 13:20]] v[[Ezek.13.20|Ezek 13:20]], all with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפָשׁוֺת‎</span> (of magic arts, necromancy, etc.). 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיד‎</span>] **verb denominative Hithpa\`el** ==supply oneself with provisions, take as one's provision== — ***perfect 1 plural*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצְטַיַּדְנוּ‎</span> [[Josh.9.12|Josh 9:12]] this bread ***we took as our provision; Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֵיִּצְטַיָָּֽדוּ‎</span> v[[Josh.9.4|Josh 9:4]] (so read for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצְטַיָָּֽרוּ‎</span>, Manuscripts [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others), absolute
